span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;
    color: #c00100;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.pkg-exc ul li {

}

<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Cheap Thailand Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/thailand-tour-packages" title="Thailand Tour Packages">Thailand</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Cheap Thailand Tour Package</span></span></p>

<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c2ddca456b2_38058616" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">

<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/cheap-thailand.jpg" alt="Best of Thailand Tour Package" title="Best of Thailand Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Check out our most customized Best of Thailand Tour Package and get to know about the rich culture and relax along the white sandy beaches and the tropical islands. Thailand is the country which offers the beauties of these worlds. Read the complete itinerary and get amazed with the peaceful and the elegant Buddha Temples and stroll along the exotic beaches in Thailand where you can have a great time with your family and friends.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Cheap Thailand Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Bangkok – Pattaya</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Welcome to the magical land of Thailand! Upon your arrival in Bangkok drive towards Pattaya and cover 2 km long distance to Pattaya. On reaching the destination city check-into the hotel room and then in the evening get yourself dressed up nicely as you are going to witness the charm of Alcazar Show organized on a huge level. This show is going to be a full entertainment package with dance performances, Music Shows, Kids Shows, and light and sound show. Move back to the hotel after this show and treat your taste buds with lip-smacking Thai cuisine in dinner followed by a relaxing overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Pattaya – Coral Island</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>No need to be in a hurry as the second day of the trip is scheduled for a half-day trip to hop on the Coral Island. Get transferred to the Island after a healthy lunch and indulge yourself in water sport activities like underwater walk, parasailing, etc. to add more fun to your tour with speed boat transfer and then later in the evening make yourself feel relaxed.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> These activities are done on a direct payment basis by you as this is not included in the itinerary.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Pattaya – Bangkok</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On the third day of the journey, you will be driving towards the capital city of Thailand where you can explore numerous temples, shopping places, and various spots to indulge in leisure activities. Once you are done with the temple tour of the city, go to the shopping areas and buy some souvenirs for your family and friends. Make an overnight halt at your pre-decided hotels in Bangkok.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Bangkok</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>No need to be in a hurry as the second day of the trip is scheduled for a half-day trip to hop on the Coral Island. Get transferred to the Island after a healthy lunch and indulge yourself in water sport activities like underwater walk, parasailing, etc. to add more fun to your tour with speed boat transfer and then later in the evening make yourself feel relaxed.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> These activities are done on a direct payment basis by you as this is not included in the itinerary.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Departure from Bangkok</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post serving your taste buds with mouth-watering breakfast at the hotel, get your baggage ready and complete the check-out formalities at the hotel before you leave for the airport for boarding your flight. Our representative says goodbye with your arrival at Bangkok Airport.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Cheap Thailand Tour Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Thailand The Best Destination For Tourism?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Thailand truly has a chaotic charm that attracts people from all over the world, with epic tropical beauty, ancient temples, an amazing food scene, and a vibrant nightlife. The country, also known as the Land of Smiles, never fails to disappoint.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Thailand's Most Famous Product?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Thailand is well-known for its delicious and appealing Thai fruits. Thai specialties include dried jackfruit, dried mango, and dried durian. Dried Thai fruits can be found and purchased in a variety of markets, supermarkets such as Big C, and thousands of other locations throughout Thailand.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Most Popular Tourist Destination In Thailand?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Krabi is the most iconic of all Thailand vacation destinations. The breathtaking limestone cliffs, surreal beaches, extensive jungle and hidden caves, the Emerald Lagoon, and the Hot Water Springs.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Thailand's Culture Like?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Thailand's culture is a mash-up of strong Indian influences, Chinese traditions, and uniquely Thai elements. The "Land of a Thousand Smiles" is a must-see destination in South East Asia due to its diverse geography, friendly people, and stunning scenery.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Kind Of Food Is Popular In Thailand?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> </p>
<ol>
<li>Goong Tom Yum (Spicy Shrimp Soup)</li>
<li>Tum Som (Spicy Green Papaya Salad)</li>
<li>Tom Kha Kai's (Chicken in Coconut Soup)</li>
<li>Daeng Gaeng (Red Curry)</li>
<li>Thai Pad Thai (Thai style Fried Noodles)</li>
<li>Pad Khao (Fried Rice)</li>
</ol></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
